IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO FUEL THE QUALITY AND QUANTITY OF MENTORING RELATIONSHIPS FOR AMERICA'S YOUNG PEOPLE AND TO CLOSE THE MENTORING GAP.
IRS990.MissionDesc: MENTOR'S MISSION IS TO FUEL THE QUALITY AND QUANTITY OF MENTORING RELATIONSHIPS FOR AMERICA'S YOUNG PEOPLE AND TO CLOSE THE MENTORING GAP. MENTOR DRIVES THE INVESTMENT OF TIME AND MONEY INTO HIGH IMPACT MENTORING PROGRAMS THROUGH ADVOCACY, INFLUENCE STRATEGY AND PUBLIC AWARENESS. MENTOR ADVANCE QUALITY MENTORING THROUGH THE DEVELOPMENT AND DELIVERY OF STANDARDS, CUTTING-EDGE RESEARCH, STATE OF-THE-ART TOOLS, AND A NATIONAL NETWORK OF LOCAL CAPACITY AND MOVEMENT BUILDERS.
IRS990.Desc: MENTORING PARTNERSHIP NETWORK SUPPORT & DEVELOPMENT:MENTOR HAS BUILT AND FOSTERED A NETWORK OF AFFILIATE MENTORING PARTNERSHIPS (MPS) ACROSS THE COUNTRY TO DELIVER TRAINING AND CONSULTING TO YOUTH MENTORING PROGRAMS OF ALL TYPES AND SIZES. MENTORING PARTNERSHIPS SERVE AS STRATEGIC LOCAL FIELD-BUILDING PARTNERS, ADVANCE VOLUNTEER RECRUITMENT, BUILD PUBLIC AWARENESS, AND PROVIDE A UNIFIED VOICE FOR ADVOCACY AND POLICY, ULTIMATELY IN AN EFFORT TO OPTIMIZE OUTCOMES FOR YOUTH AND EXPAND MENTORING SERVICES TO YOUNG PEOPLE. MENTOR SUPPORTS ITS NETWORK OF AFFILIATE MENTORING PARTNERSHIPS THROUGH KNOWLEDGE SHARING, NETWORK EFFICIENCIES, AND LOCAL-NATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES. MENTORING PARTNERSHIPS ARE THE KEY INFORMANT AND DISTRIBUTION CHAIN FOR MENTOR. IN 2015 MENTOR CONTINUED TO SUPPORT THE ILLINOIS MENTORING PARTNERSHIP LAUNCHED IN 2012 AND MENTOR NEW YORK. MENTOR ALSO PROVIDED MPS THE OPPORTUNITY TO EXCHANGE SUCCESSFUL STRATEGIES FOR ENHANCING THE FIELD OF YOUTH MENTORING AT THE 2015 STATES CAUCUS WHICH WAS ATTENDED BY 50 ATTENDEES FROM 24 MPS. ADDITIONALLY, MENTOR LAUNCHED THE AMERICORPS VISTA ASPIRE MENTORING CORPS THROUGH A PUBLIC-PRIVATE PARTNERSHIP WITH AT&T AND THE CORPORATION FOR NATIONAL AND COMMUNITY SERVICE. THE ASPIRE MENTORING CORPS PROVIDED INCREASED CAPACITY FOR OUR NETWORK OF AFFILIATE MENTORING PARTNERSHIPS TO ADVANCE KEY SERVICES TO THE MENTORING FIELD AND BUILD STRONGER BRIDGES TO THE PRIVATE SECTOR.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PROMOTION, PUBLIC EDUCATION & POLICY:MENTOR EDUCATES THE GENERAL PUBLIC, POLICYMAKERS, AND THE PRIVATE SECTOR ABOUT THE EFFECTIVENESS OF MENTORING AS A PROVEN STRATEGY FOR HELPING YOUNG PEOPLE BECOME SUCCESSFUL ADULTS AND SEEKS INCREASED SYSTEMIC INTEGRATION OF MENTORING. ANNUAL ACTIVITIES INCLUDE LEADING THE ANNUAL PUBLIC AWARENESS CAMPAIGN NATIONAL MENTORING MONTH IN JANUARY, CONVENING THE NATIONAL MENTORING SUMMIT, THE ONLY NATIONAL CONFERENCE FOR THE MENTORING FIELD INCLUDING PRACTITIONERS, RESEARCHERS, AND LEADERS FROM THE PRIVATE AND PUBLIC SECTORS, AS WELL AS ADVOCATING FOR EXPANDING QUALITY MENTORING PROGRAMS WITH CONGRESS AND THE ADMINISTRATION. 2015 MARKED MENTOR'S 25TH ANNIVERSARY. MENTOR CELEBRATED THIS MILESTONE BY HOSTING AN EVENT IN NYC WHICH INTRODUCED NEW SUPPORTERS TO OUR WORK AND REENGAGED LAPSED SUPPORTERS WITH THE ORGANIZATION. MENTOR ALSO SAW A 13% INCREASE IN ATTENDANCE AT THE 2015 NATIONAL MENTORING SUMMIT (880 INDIVIDUALS PARTICIPATED IN THE CONFERENCE). IN AN EFFORT TO BE SEEN AS A ONE STOP RESOURCE FOR BUILDING QUALITY MENTORING EFFORTS AND ADVANCING THE MENTORING MOVEMENT MENTOR IMPLEMENTED A BRAND REFRESH AND LAUNCHED A NEW WEBSITE. MENTOR ALSO WORKED TO DEVELOP A CAUSE ELEVATING CAMPAIGN CALLED IN REAL LIFE (LAUNCHED DURING 2016 NATIONAL MENTORING MONTH) IN PARTNERSHIP WITH THE NBA FAMILY. AS PART OF THE CAMPAIGN SEVERAL NBA PLAYERS RELEASED VIDEOS AND SHARED THEM WITH THEIR SOCIAL MEDIA NETWORKS. BEYOND THE NBA, WORK WITH THE WHITE HOUSE LED TO SOME OTHER OPPORTUNITIES WITH CELEBRITIES INTERESTED IN ELEVATING MY BROTHER'S KEEPER AND MENTORING INCLUDING A VIDEO FROM HIP HOP ARTIST KENDRICK LAMAR. TO EXPAND NATIONAL PRIVATE SECTOR ENGAGEMENT AND CLIENT SERVICES MENTOR PARTNERED WITH EY TO RELEASE A REPORT CALLED "MENTORING: AT THE CROSSROADS OF EDUCATION, BUSINESS AND COMMUNITY" AT THE 2015 SUMMIT. KEY NEW ENGAGEMENTS HAVE BEEN LAUNCHED WITH JPMORGAN CHASE & CO., DELOITTE, AND AT&T. MENTOR HAS ALSO CONTINUED TO BUILD AND DEVELOP STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIPS WITH DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (GROWTH MINDSET FOR MENTORS, SUCCESS MENTORS), MY BROTHER'S KEEPER ALLIANCE (NATIONAL TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE PROVIDER ON MENTORING FOR BOYS AND YOUNG MEN OF COLOR), AND LINKEDIN (CAMPAIGN PARTNER PROMOTING MENTORING).

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: PRODUCT AND PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT:ONE OF MENTOR'S CORE PRIORITIES IS TO DRIVE EXCELLENCE AND RIGOR SO THAT THE QUALITY & QUANTITY OF MENTORING AND MENTORING EXPERIENCES ARE ENHANCED ACROSS THOUSANDS OF PROGRAMS IN AMERICA. MENTOR DOES THIS BY ESTABLISHING NATIONALLY RECOGNIZED STANDARDS FOR SAFE AND EFFECTIVE MENTORING PROGRAMS CALLED THE ELEMENTS OF EFFECTIVE PRACTICE FOR MENTORING , DEVELOPING TOOLS TO DISSEMINATE THESE EVIDENCED-BASED PRACTICES AND SHARE INNOVATION ACROSS THE MENTORING FIELD, OPERATING THE ONLY NATIONAL DATABASE FOR VOLUNTEER MENTORING OPPORTUNITIES, AND INFORMING AND IMPLEMENTING NEW RESEARCH TO INCREASE AND ENHANCE THE IMPACT OF QUALITY MENTORING PROGRAMS ACROSS THE COUNTRY. IN 2015, MENTOR, RELEASED THE 4TH EDITION OF THE "ELEMENTS OF EFFECTIVE PRACTICE FOR MENTORING" TO REFLECT THE MOST UP-TO-DATE RESEARCH, PRACTICE, AND THINKING IN THE MENTORING FIELD. IN THE FIRST MONTH ONLINE, IT WAS DOWNLOADED MORE THAN 2,500 TIMES. TO HELP MENTORING PROGRAMS APPLY THE STANDARDS OF PRACTICE OUTLINED IN THE "ELEMENTS OF EFFECTIVE PRACTICE FOR MENTORING", MENTOR CONTINUED THE ROLL OUT OF THE NATIONAL QUALITY MENTORING SYSTEM, A NATIONAL ASSESSMENT AND IMPROVEMENT PROCESS, ACROSS THEIR AFFILIATE MENTORING PARTNERSHIP NETWORK AND CREATED A SPECIAL BADGE TO PROVIDE ADDITIONAL VISIBILITY, RECOGNITION, ACCOUNTABILITY AND A LEVEL OF USEFULNESS TO ALL STAKEHOLDERS, AND PARTICULARLY HELPS THOSE SEEKING TO IDENTIFY VOLUNTEER OPPORTUNITIES. MENTOR ALSO CONTINUED TO FACILITATE THE COLLABORATIVE MENTORING WEBINAR SERIES (CMWS), MONTHLY EDUCATIONAL WEBINARS GEARED TOWARD MENTORING PROGRAM AND YOUTH DEVELOPMENT PRACTITIONERS. IN 2015 THE CMWS AVERAGED 520 REGISTRANTS EACH MONTH FROM 50 STATES AND 27 INTERNATIONAL LOCATIONS. MENTOR IS ALSO IN THE THIRD YEAR OF MANAGING THE OJJDP NATIONAL MENTORING RESOURCE CENTER (NMRC), WHICH CONSISTS OF THREE PARTS: AN ONLINE RESOURCE FOR MENTORING PROGRAMS, RESEARCH BOARD REVIEW OF RESOURCES, AND THE PROVISION OF RESEARCH INFUSED TRAINING AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE. SINCE LAUNCHING THE NMRC, MENTOR HAS RECEIVED 516 ONLINE TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE REQUESTS. IN THE PAST YEAR ALONE, 13,118 USERS VISITED THE NMRC WEBSITE - 66% BEING NEW VISITORS.

ContractorCompensationGrp.ServicesDesc: OPERATE RESEARCH BOARD FOR NATIONAL MENT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED NET ASSETS CONSIST OF ONE FUND, ESTABLISHED TO PROVIDE EARNINGS REVENUE TO BE USED FOR UNRESTRICTED PURPOSES.

THE ORGANIZATION ACCOUNTS FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES IN ACCORDANCE WITH ASC TOPIC, INCOME TAXES. THIS STANDARD CLARIFIES THE ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN TAX POSITIONS AND PRESCRIBES A RECOGNITION THRESHOLD AND MEASUREMENT ATTRIBUTE FOR THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS REGARDING A TAX POSITION TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN. THE ORGANIZATION HAS DETERMINED THAT THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS WHICH QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AT DECEMBER 31, 2015. THE ORGANIZATION'S INFORMATION RETURNS ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE FEDERAL AND STATE JURISDICTIONS AND GENERALLY REMAIN OPEN FOR THE MOST RECENT THREE YEARS.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: BIG BROTHERS BIG SISTERS OF CENTRAL OHIO INC
UNITED WAY OF PALM BEACH COUNTY

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORT THE CENTER FOR EVIDENCE BASED MENTORING

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: RECEIVING ORGANIZATION SIGN A LETTER OF AGREEMENT TO FOLLOW PROCEDURES OR HAVE FUNDS REVOKED. ALL PAYMENTS ARE MADE IN THE U.S. FOR GRANTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: 990 REVIEW THE DRAFT IRS FORM 990 IS FIRST REVIEWED BY THE AUDIT COMMITTEE. ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT STAFF AND THE AUDITORS PARTICIPATE IN THAT REVIEW. THE AUDIT COMMITTEE FINISHES THE MEETING IN EXECUTIVE SESSION WITH THE AUDITORS, THE AUDIT COMMITTEE RECOMMENDS THE FILING OF THE FORM 990, WITH CHANGES AS NEEDED. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE AUDIT COMMITTEE'S REPORT AT THE NEXT MEETING, AND APPROVES THE FILING OF THE FORM 990. THE FULL BOARD REVIEWS THE AUDIT COMMITTEE'S REPORT AT ITS NEXT MEETING, AND CONFIRMS THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE'S ACCEPTANCE OF THE FORM 990.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FIRST, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, TRUSTEES, AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE AWARE OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. IN ADDITION, ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT STAFF PREPARE AN ANNUAL LIST OF CONSULTANTS FOR AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEW A LIST WHICH IS SUBSEQUENTLY REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND THE FULL BOARD. ANY CONFLICT OF INTEREST WOULD BE UNCOVERED IN THIS SERIES OF REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CEO SALARY WAS RECOMMENDED BY AN INDEPENDENT EXECUTIVE RECRUITMENT FIRM. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWED THE RECOMMENDATION, AND NEGOTIATED THE SALARY WITH THE CEO. ALL OTHER STAFF SALARIES ARE REVIEWED AT LENGTH BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AS PART OF THE ANNUAL BUDGET PROCESS. STAFF TENURE, EXPERIENCE, SKILL SET, AND COMPARISONS WITH SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS ARE TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
CONSULTANTS: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 1,013,809. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 17,359. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 23,671. TOTAL EXPENSES 1,054,839.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
